attributes.action: overturn the FSA waiver on legal challenges to banks' charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British taxpayer has just bailed out UK banks to the tune of £250 billion. Meanwhile, while the UK taxpayers suffer a recession created by the banks, they are being hit with excessive charges which the Office for Fair Trading views as unfair. The Financial Services Authority has just permitted the banks to defer the upcoming court case for another six months. We the undersigned insist that the British government resolves this issue immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
